channel.title: Dunder Mifflin's GFX Stuff
channel.description:
[center][size=12pt][u][b] Dunder Mifflin's GFX Stuff[/b][/u][/size]
Before any of you flame me im a BEGINNER so don't bitch at me that you're better then me. With that said, here is some of my stuff:
[u][b]Iron Man Swirl Effect:[/b][/u]
[img]http://i584.photobucket.com/albums/ss285/Nightmare97/forgeiron.jpg[/img]
Made that one when avengers came out.
Messed around with an effect and got this: [IMG]http://i47.tinypic.com/35mioo2.png[/img]
Thats it so far, Id like all feedback, and if your gonna criticize. at least make it constructive. Yeah I used the swirl effect in both cause it was the newest thing I learned, I will release more photos in the future and hopefully we will see some improvement in my skills. Shankz [/center]

Why aer you making the superheros look gay?

Practicing for the gay porn industry bebe.

Me either, I always had my glow looking like N’s
